actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill relating to the sale of certain timber, cord wood, and other forest products.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of Agriculture to sell timber and cordwood and other forest products under the Act of June 4, 1987 without advertisement provided the quantity sold does not exceed $250,000 board feet of timber or $5,000, which ever is the lesser. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 47)

titles.title: A bill relating to the sale of certain timber, cord wood, and other forest products.
